Class HeroPower

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.HeroPower

  • class HeroPower
extends java.lang.Object
    The complete description of a Hero's Power.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Martin Ars Alexis Claveau Alexis Loret Maud Van Dorssen

    • Constructor Detail

      • HeroPower

        HeroPower(int damage,
          int nbSummon,
          int idInvocation,
          int armorBuff,
          java.lang.String target,
          java.lang.String description)
        Parameters:
        damage - the amount of damage that the hero can inflict
        nbSummon - the amount of invocations that the hero can perfom
        idInvocation - the hero's id of the invocation
        armorBuff - the amount of the armor buff that the hero can give
        target - a simple text with the target of the hero
        description - the description of the hero
